description:
This application will allow you to check and keep track of beers that you have enjoyed as part of the Flying Saucer - UFO - Beer Knurd club in real time. 

Please make sure you have set your password up on http://www.beerknurd.com  --   the default password is beerknurd.

Visit a Flying Saucer near you soon.

Version 1.0.6 now allows filtering of draft and bottles from the beer menus.  Also you can now email or SMS a beer to your friend! Various other fixes are also included in this release.

Version 1.0.5 includes a place to set the current Saucer you are visiting so that the beers filter for that Saucer Location.  Also start typing on any of the beer screens to search for a beer.

  Version 1.0.4 now includes support for comments on your beers on all screens.
